Package me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder.core

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder.core.Core
  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    An interwoven implementation of Pathfinder's field-mapping and PathfindingCore's mathematical approach to finding the quickest possible to path from point A to point B - literally.
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
